mapper.sql: LXID, LXNAME, nvl(GG,'无'), nvl(DW,' '), BZ, PX, QYZT
YHID, YHNAME, DW, nvl(DJ,0), nvl(GRDE,0), YHXMMS, QYZT, DEZT, DEQDZT, ISLFXB, ISLQLMXB, PX
BHID, BHNAME, DW, BHMS, WXSX, QYZT, PX
mapper.select: select ,lxid id,lxname text from HTGL_GLJLXB where LXID like #{lxid} || '___'
select ,lxid id,lxname text from HTGL_GLJLXB where LXID = '003'
select ,lxid id,lxname text from HTGL_GLJLXB where LXID = '002'
select , yhid id, yhname text from HTGL_YHLXB where YHID like #{yhid} || '__' order by px,yhid
select ,yhid id, yhname text from HTGL_YHLXB where YHID like '__' order by px,yhid
select from HTGL_MJLX order by key
select nvl(dj,0) "dj" from HTGL_GLJJGB where LXID = '001001' and BMCODE like #{bmcode} || '%'

select t2.lxname,t2.lxid,nvl(t2.gg,'无') gg,t2.bm,nvl(t1.sl,0) sl,nvl(t3.dj,0) dj,nvl(t2.dw,'-') dw from htgl_deb t1 left join htgl_gljlxb t2 on t1.lxid = t2.lxid left join htgl_gljjgb t3 on t2.lxid = t3.lxid and t3.bmcode like #{bmcode} || '%' where t1.YHID = #{yhid} and t2.LXID like '002%'

select t2.lxname,t2.lxid,nvl(t2.gg,'无') gg,t2.bm,nvl(t1.sl,0) sl,nvl(t3.dj,0) dj ,nvl(t2.dw,'-') dw from htgl_deb t1 left join htgl_gljlxb t2 on t1.lxid = t2.lxid left join htgl_gljjgb t3 on t2.lxid = t3.lxid and t3.bmcode like #{bmcode} || '%' where t1.YHID = #{yhid} and t2.LXID like '003%'
select VALUE from HTGL_ZTSMB where ZTCODE = #{ztcode} and KEY = #{key}
select BHNAME from HTGL_BHLX where BHID = #{bhid}

insert into RCYH_ZPJLB (SSID, RYID,ZPMC,ZPDZ,ZPID,ZPMS,ZPDX)
(select #{item.ssid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zpdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.zpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zpms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.zpdx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual )
select SSID, RYID,ZPMC,ZPDZ,ZPID,ZPMS,ZPDX from RCYH_ZPJLB where SSID = #{ssid}
select yname from htgl_nyjcb where stime <= to_date(#{today},'yyyy-mm-dd') and etime >= to_date(#{today},'yyyy-mm-dd')
select STIME,ETIME from HTGL_NYJCB where stime <= to_date(#{today},'yyyy-mm-dd') and etime >= to_date(#{today},'yyyy-mm-dd')
select STIME,ETIME from HTGL_NYJCB where YNAME = #{ssny}
select t1.ldcode "value",t1.ldname "text",t1.SZHH "szhh",t1.EZHH "ezhh" from HTGL_LDB t1 left join HTGL_BMB t2 on t1.bmcode = t2.bmcode where t1.bmcode like #{bmcode} || '__' and t2.BMLX = '0102'
select WXSX from HTGL_BHLX where BHID = #{bhid}
select nvl(DJ,0) from HTGL_GLJJGB where bmcode = ( select BMCODE from HTGL_BMB where BMCODE like substr(BMCODE,0,length(#{bmcode})-4) || '__' and BMLX = '0104') and LXID = #{id}

select t1.yhid "yhid",t2.lxid "lxid",t1.sl "sl",nvl(t2.dj,0) "dj",t2.bmcode "bmcode",t3.lxname "lxname",t3.gg "gg",t3.dw "dw" from htgl_deb t1 left join htgl_gljjgb t2 on t2.lxid = t1.lxid left join htgl_gljlxb t3 on t2.lxid = t3.lxid where t1.yhid = #{yhid} and t2.bmcode = #{bmcode}
select yhid "yhid",yhname "yhname" ,dw "dw" ,grde "grde" from htgl_yhlxb where YHID =#{yhid}
select lxcode from HTGL_LDB where LDCODE = #{ldcode}
select t1.ryid "ryid",t1.ryname "ryname" from HTGL_RYB t1 left join HTGL_BMB t2 on t1.BMCODE = t2.BMCODE where t1.BMCODE = #{bmcode} order by t1.zw

select t2.ryname text,t1.bmname "group", t2.* from HTGL_BMB t1 left join HTGL_RYB t2 on t1.BMCODE = t2.BMCODE where t1.bmcode like substr(#{bmcode},0,length(#{bmcode})-2) || '__' and t2.qyzt=1 order by t1.bmcode,t2.zw
select t1.*,t2.bmname from HTGL_RYB t1 left join HTGL_BMB t2 on t1.bmcode = t2.bmcode where t1.bmcode = #{bmcode} and t1.qyzt=1 order by t2.bmcode,t1.ZW

select yname from htgl_nyjcb where stime <= to_date(#{datetime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(to_char(ETIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') || '23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= to_date(#{datetime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
select grde from htgl_yhlxb where yhid = #{yhid}
select dj from htgl_yhlxb where yhid = #{yhid}
